title: Loot Boxes, Gambling, League of legends
body:
https://i1.wp.com/www.drchaos.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/claw-1.gif?resize=211%2C350

but for reals though loot boxes are gambling if you have any option to put real money in.

Just as Casinos give "FIRST 3 SPINS FREE" to get you sucked in, Game Devs are giving you "free spins" with their "earnable" chests.
While you "technically" don't have to put money in, it's sales baiting and gambling and they all know it. Just the same as the free spins at some casinos, you could earn the bestest prize of all, but 99.999999% of the time you won't, which creates similar impulses as drug addiction.

#Opinions past this point
##children do not have impulse control and companies know it
Yes, people can resist it. You may be able to resist it. Other people cannot. Knowingly selling people things (to children) to feed an addiction and make profit is unethical (which is why casino's are so heavily regulated and are strictly for adults).

But hey, who needs business ethics anymore.
